description: Release Managers: Chun-Hung Hsiao, Gaston Kleiman

Failed to build gRPC on Linux without OpenSSL.
Container stuck at ISOLATING due to FD leak

Transition libprocess on Windows to use the Thread Pool API
Composing containerizer improvements
Per Framework Metrics on Master
Allocation logic cleanup.
Support container Cgroup FS mount.
Make use of C++11 `override` keyword
Add timer and percentile for docker pull latency distribution.
Support local enabled cgroups subsystems automatically.
Add GC capability to nested containers
Add capability so mesos can programmatically decode .zip, .tar, .gzip, and other common file compression schemes

Add a no-enforce option to the `network/ports` isolator.
mesos-agent high cpu usage because of numerous /proc/mounts reads
Rename variable names in slave.hpp to be more explicit.
Add alg RS256 support for JWT generator and validator in libprocess
Automatically create whitelisted devices.
Build the "unsecure" gRPC libraries to remove SSL dependency.
Get rid of extra `containerizer->wait()` calls in tests.
Add -fno-omit-frame-pointer to improve debugging and profiling.
Add framework metrics benchmark test.
Per Framework SUBSCRIBE metrics.
Support per-container container logger configuration.
Refactor the libprocess gRPC warpper.
Manage Python2 and 3 in build steps
`slave.available()` in the allocator is expensive and drags down allocation performance.
Add a better benchmark for range type resources.
Allow for unbundled libevent in CMake builds to work around 2.1.x SSL issues.
Allow resources to be removed when updating the sorter.
Make gRPC call deadline configurable.
Improve performance of json parsing by avoiding conversion cost.
cgroups::verify is expensive and is done implicitly during cgroups operations.
Optimize range subtraction operation.
Adopt rapidjson for improved json serialization performance.
Refactor capability related logic in the allocator.
Add move support to the Resources / Resource_ wrappers.
Parallel serving of '/state' requests in the Master.

Move implementations of Framework struct functions out of master.hpp.

Update composing containerizer tests.
